headline: INFICON TRANSPECTOR XPR3 GAS ANALYSIS SYSTEM
description: Gas Analysis System - High Sensitivity In-Situ Gas Analysis
categories.lvl1: Vacuum Processing Equipment > Vacuum Process Instrumentation
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Process Instrumentation > Residual Gas Analyzers
specstable:
Manufacturer Inficon
Model Transpector XPR3 - XPRTX100
Description Gas Analysis System
Mass Range 100 AMU
Other Information

Mass range: 1-100 amu
Resolution: < 1 @ 10% measured at mass 4, 20, 28 and 40
Mass filter type: Quadrupole
Detector type: Off-axis FC and microchannel plate EM
Temperature coefficient (FC signal at 1E-4 Torr of Ar): < 1% of peak height per °C
Mass Position Stability: < 0.1 amu over 24 hours
Peak Ratio Stability (2/40, 4/40, 20/40, 28/40): < 2% over 24 hours

Click here for additional information Inficon XPR3 Gas Analysis System
